DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate efficacy safety MK0974 compare placebo acute migraine .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study MK0974 Acute Migraine ( 0974-016 )
DOC.criteria: Patient least 1 year history migraine ( without aura ) Females childbearing year must use acceptable contraception throughout trial Patient pregnant/breastfeeding ( female expect conceive study period ) Patient history evidence uncontrolled diabetes , Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) disease . Patient uncontrolled cardiovascular disease Patient major depression , pain syndrome might interfere study assessment , psychiatric condition , dementia , significant neurological disorder ( migraine ) Patient history gastric small intestinal surgery disease cause malabsorption Patient history cancer within last 5 year
